alert.note: Alert for DeSoto (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued September 20 at 7:58AM EDT until further notice by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Florida... Horse Creek Near Arcadia at SR 72 affecting DeSoto County. .Recent heavy rains have many rivers and streams in minor to moderate flood. For the Horse Creek...including Arcadia at SR 72...Moderate flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Horse Creek Near Arcadia at SR 72. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 14.0 feet, Buildings in Hidden Acres flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:30 AM EDT Tuesday the stage was 14.3 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 7:30 AM EDT Tuesday was 14.3 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 14.5 feet this evening. - Flood stage is 12.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 14.5 feet on 10/11/1995. - https://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (8 am EDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Wed Thu Fri Sat Sun Horse Creek Arcadia at SR 7 12.0 14.3 Tue 7 am 14.5 14.1 13.8 13.4 MSG &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this evening at 1100 PM EDT.
